Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Measure the attendance of your raid by creating snapshots.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add/subtract EP for the whole guild.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Decay/inflate the EPGP standings for the whole guild.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Decay/inflate the EP for the whole guild.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Decay/inflate the GP for the whole guild.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Reset EPGP standings to default values for the whole guild.");

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: self:HighlightText(0,0);

FontString.name: $parent_desc
FontString.text: Adds/Subtracts an amount of EP for the entire raid

Scripts.OnLoad:
self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton"); CEPGP_guild_log_restore_desc:SetText("Select the record you would like to restore

|c00FF0000Make sure this is what you want to do.
This will overwrite ALL current guild EPGP
standings with the record.");

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Display status updates during the import process.");

Scripts.OnLoad: self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton"); CEPGP_settings_import_desc:SetText("Use this feature to import another player's CEPGP configuration.\n|cFFFF0000Warning! This will overwrite all of your existing settings!|r\nThe player must be in your guild or raid group");

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Item ID can be found by searching for the item on classic.wowhead.com and grabbing it from the URL.\nFor exmaple: https://classic.wowhead.com/item=xxxxx (xxxxx will be the item ID).");

Scripts.OnLoad: self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton"); CEPGP_override_desc:SetText("This window allows you to override the gp value\nof an item to what ever you specify.\n|c00FF0000Only enter either an item name OR an item ID|r");

FontString.name: CEPGP_traffic_desc
FontString.text: A record of the EPGP traffic in your guild

Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("|c000077BEWhy can't I share some traffic entries?|r
Some traffic entries cannot be shared because they are missing information which was added in version 1.12.10.
If a traffic entry was added before you (or your loot master) started using this version, it cannot be shared.

Another reason why you can't share a certain traffic entry is because the entry might contain malformed data.
The best way to avoid this is to ensure that you and your loot master are running the latest version of CEPGP.

|c00FF0000Why is this taking so long?|r
To try to avoid disconnecting you, CEPGP transmits traffic entries at a rate of approximately one log per 0.1 seconds. You currently have " .. #CEPGP.Traffic .. " entries.");

Scripts.OnLoad:
CEPGP_notice_text:SetText("Thank you for choosing to use Classic EPGP!
I hope that you enjoy using this addon and I hope that it helps your guild
how ever you end up using it.

Just one thing you should know - this addon needs to have
full control over your officer notes to maintain EPGP records.
Meaning, as this addon attempts to maintain your records, it will overwrite
any existing officer notes. Similarly, if you want your guild members to
be able to see their EP and GP values, they need to be able to see
officer notes too. Essentially, the addon can only see what you can see.

This addon is designed and really does work best if your
your whole guild (or at least your raid team) has it installed.
This will provide you with functions like loot council support
and being able to see what items your raid members are wearing
when you're distributing items.

I hope you enjoy using the addon and if you have any feature requests or
find a bug, please submit a ticket on the addon GitHub page:
github.com/Alumian/CEPGP-Retail"); CEPGP_notice_frame:SetWidth(CEPGP_notice_text:GetStringWidth()+25);

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Records a snapshot of the players currently in your raid group.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Filters the records to show you only the players\nthat were present in the selected snapshot.");

Scripts.OnShow: local total = CEPGP_ntgetn(CEPGP.Attendance); self:SetText("Total Snapshots Recorded: " .. total);

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: self:HighlightText(0,0);

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Changes export format to CSV");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Changes export format to JSON.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add classes to the exported fields.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add guild ranks to the exported fields.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add priority to the exported fields.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add a trailing comma at the end of each record.");

Scripts.OnLoad: CEPGP_confirmation_desc:SetText("Would you like to use CEPGP for this raid?");

CEPGP_rank_filter_desc:SetText("Want to hide a rank from the guild list?
Tick the box next to the rank you want to hide.

Note: This will not exclude the rank from decay!
To exclude a rank from EPGP modifications,
see the rank exclusions menu in options."); self:SetWidth(CEPGP_rank_filter_desc:GetStringWidth()+40);

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: self:HighlightText(0,0);

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Processes the CSV string supplied and updates your guild standings.");

Scripts.OnLoad:
CEPGP_import_guide_text:SetText("Paste a CSV formatted string in to
the box on the left and then
click the "Import Standings" button
to confirm the changes.
The expected format to use is:
player,EP,GP, (Include the
trailing comma after GP).

A record of your guild standings
will be automatically saved incase
you need to revert the changes.");

FontString.name: $parent_heading
FontString.text: Classic EPGP End User License Agreement

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Exclude certain ranks from EPGP modifications");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Import CEPGP configuration from a guild member, overwriting your own.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Sends your CEPGP configuration to guild members with 'Allow Rank to Manage Addon Configuration' enabled.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("When enabled, allows players of selected guild ranks to manage your CEPGP configuration");

FontString.name: CEPGP_sync_rank_text
FontString.text: Select Which Ranks Can Manage Your Configuration:

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allows your to decay EP and GP independently");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Sets the speed in seconds that CEPGP scans the Guild and Raid roster for updates. The default value is 0.0001.
This will not change the frequency that the roster is scanned, but it will change how quickly it is scanned each time there is an update.

|CFFFF0000Caution!|r
Setting the poll rate to be too fast can cause small, frequent lag spikes.
The prevent stability issues, the minimum value permitted for this setting is 0.0001.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Sets the channel that EPGP modifications are sent to.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Specify the main character for the new link");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Specify the alt character for the new link");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Block EPGP modifications on alts. When enabled, the only way that alts can have their EPGP standings changed\nis when the standings change on their main or when a decay or reset occurs.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("When enabled, alts will have the same EP as their mains");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("When enabled, alts will have the same GP as their mains");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Apply a GP modifier for items in each raid");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allows you to create permanent overrides for item GP values.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Sets the GP that all players start at and the minimum GP that players can reach.\nNote: This change will not take effect until the player's GP is modified.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("When enabled, applies a 'Decay-Free Threshold' equal to the minimum GP.

For example: A player with 100GP, minimum GP of 25 and a decay rate of 10%.
This option disabled: GP will decay 10% of 100.
This option enabled: GP will decay 10% of 75.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Shows GP values on tooltips based on your current GP formula.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("|c000077BELoot Master Feature|r
Need more than 4 loot buttons? Enable this option to add additional keywords for loot responses.

Any keywords you use here will be announced when loot distribution starts regardless
of whether or not you have checked 'Hide Keyphrase Alternatives in Loot Announcement'.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("|c000077BEWhat is a Label?|r
The label is the actual response for this discount.
For example: Where 'need' might be the keyword, this might reflect 'Main Spec' or 'greed' might reflect 'Off Spec'.
This is what will be recorded in your traffic log.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("|c000077BEWhat is a Keyword?|r\nThe keyword is what people need to whisper you to use this response.\nThis word is not recorded in traffic.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("|c000077BEDiscounts|r
The discount is used as written. For example, if you enter 50, then it will be a 50% discount.

|c000077BETip!|r
If you want a response which |c00FF00FFincreases|r the cost of an item, make the % Discount negative.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("How many seconds raid members have before they automatically pass on an item.\n0 = disabled (no auto passing)");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("The message when each item is announced");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("When announcing loot, a raid warning will be sent out indicating what item is being distributed.");

FontString.name: $parent_label
FontString.text: Hide Whisper Keywords in Loot Announcement

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Prevents showing the keyphrase alternatives for each response in the loot announcement message.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("When enabled, players can whisper you with an alternate response to change their response");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("When enabled, all messages indicating a player has changed their response will be suppressed");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Suppress responses for loot in chat.\nExample: Player (class) needs.\nEnabling this will also enable \"Suppress Change of Mind Announcements\"");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Delays announcing loot responses until everyone has responded\nEnabling this feature will also enable \"Suppress Loot Response Announcements\" and \"Suppress Change of Mind Announcements\"");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Includes the priority of each player when the delayed announcements go out");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Includes the roll of each player when the delayed announcements go out");

FontString.name: $parent_label
FontString.text: Require a Minimum EP for Loot

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("If enabled, shows when a player wants loot but has less than the required amount.");

FontString.name: $parent_label
FontString.text: Show Passes in the Distribution Table

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Toggle whether or not you want players who pass on items to show up in the distribution window.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Automatically sort by response and then by priority when distributing loot");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Roll for players who have passed on an item.");

FontString.name: $parent_label
FontString.text: Include Passes When Awarding for Highest Roll

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allow 'Award to Highest Roller' to consider players who have passed");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Includes the player's roll when announcing their loot response.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("If CEPGP rolls the same number for multiple players, subsequent players will reroll until there are no duplicates.");

FontString.name: $parent_desc
FontString.text: Select which roles and Guild ranks that should be able to see loot distribution

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allow raid assists to view the loot distribution window.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allow all raid members to view the loot distribution window.");

FontString.name: $parent_label
FontString.text: Auto Show Loot Window on Distribution

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("If your loot master has 'Raid Wide Loot Visibility' enabled then CEPGP will automatically open\nto the loot distribution window when an item is announced.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Automatically pass on items if you cannot equip the item");

FontString.name: $parent_label
FontString.text: Show Priority Difference on Response Window

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Shows the change to your priority on item response window");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Shows a message in your chat window when your response is received by the loot master");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Set the minimum item rarity for the CEPGP loot window to automatically show in raids.\nRequires that you are the master looter and are in a raid group.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Sets the channel that loot responses are sent to.\nExample: Player (class) needs.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Award a percentage of automatic EP gains (for example, from boss kills)\nto players on the standby list.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Share the standby list with all raid assists.");

FontString.name: $parent_label
FontString.text: Award Standby EP to Offline Players

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Award standby EP to offline players on the standby list.");

FontString.name: $parent_label
FontString.text: Auto Add to Standby When Whispered

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allow players to whisper you a certain message to be automatically added to the standby list");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("When players whisper you this message, they will be added to the standby list automatically");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add players to the standby EP list manually.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Award standby EP to all players in the selected ranks.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add/subtract EP for players on the standby list.");
